!Priest Kanis: (Kanis begins to read the Shamaness'letter. His expression brightens.) Oh, thanks you! (Tears form in Kanis'eyes.) Thank you very much! The Shamaness will be safe in this secret location. You are a true benefactor of this Crystal Island.
